READ IF YOU WANT TO KNOW IS MOVIE ACTUALLY TRUE

Yes it is. Im Bosnian, this country is totally destroyed by them. Serbian's leaders crime is equal to Hitler and Stalin crimes. Do you know that 50 000 women were RAPED in war? Most of people who survived are on pills now, like my father. A lot of children and women are killed, they totally ruined this country.

They say it was civil war but actually Serbian army attacked and wanted to literally CLEAN THIS COUNTRY FROM BOSNIANS. This movie is like nothing what actually happened here. Sarajevo was totally ruined and Serbians from Serbia came here to destroy it actually. Serbians did genocide and they are so shitty people. They look like pigs btw. If you don't trust, google serbian fu*kin people.

Peace.

so week people took islam only,serbain people?  if bosnia was serbia i would have been called a serb now but anyways...those people that took islam were true bonsian heretics who didnt want to accept christianity in the first place but because your overl;ord nemanmjic started cutting peoples arms off and burning them publicly (in serbia) most converted and that old style pagan slavic religion was abandond ,coz constantin orderd so ,so he can have greater control of you and the rest furtheron but that didnt come to be coz the turks showed up so bosnian people had to eather convert to christianity or islam,as long as it is by the book coz tutks had a law not to kill ppl that are of the book,the true people who were not of the book had to convert ,some went to catholics some to ortodoz but the majority of the bosnian population turned to islam...so dont be talking your stupid bullshit how someone is a traitor when it was nemanjic who sold his own people to the arabs from dubrovnik...it is you that came to bosnia with your fuckin popes to convince the bosnian kids that they are in fact serbs buy bribing them with gold coins and fucking candy caramels.fuck you and your brainwashed fucking mind.Read the kingdom of slavs by orbin and there you will see where the bosnians come from,from the tribe called bessi,who are a slavic tribe ,you see it in their faces,in the last names like besic etc...and u gona tell me "no they are all serbs"  jest al u kurcu picka ti materina balava.
